mapper.update:
update t_power_quality
C_DistrictBCDId = #{cDistrictbcdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_AddressId = #{cAddressid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
C_FrameCmdId = #{cFramecmdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_RecordInsertTime = #{cRecordinserttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_FaultId = #{cFaultid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ua = #{ua,jdbcType=REAL},
ub = #{ub,jdbcType=REAL},
uc = #{uc,jdbcType=REAL},
RecordDateBCD = #{recorddatebcd,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TSegmentId = #{tsegmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
C_ChannelId = #{cChannelid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
p = #{p,jdbcType=REAL},
q = #{q,jdbcType=REAL},
i1 = #{i1,jdbcType=REAL},
i2 = #{i2,jdbcType=REAL},
i3 = #{i3,jdbcType=REAL},
i4 = #{i4,jdbcType=REAL},
i5 = #{i5,jdbcType=REAL},
i6 = #{i6,jdbcType=REAL},
i7 = #{i7,jdbcType=REAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_power_quality set C_DistrictBCDId = #{cDistrictbcdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_AddressId = #{cAddressid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, C_FrameCmdId = #{cFramecmdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_RecordInsertTime = #{cRecordinserttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, C_FaultId = #{cFaultid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ua = #{ua,jdbcType=REAL}, ub = #{ub,jdbcType=REAL}, uc = #{uc,jdbcType=REAL}, RecordDateBCD = #{recorddatebcd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TSegmentId = #{tsegmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, C_ChannelId = #{cChannelid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, p = #{p,jdbcType=REAL}, q = #{q,jdbcType=REAL}, i1 = #{i1,jdbcType=REAL}, i2 = #{i2,jdbcType=REAL}, i3 = #{i3,jdbcType=REAL}, i4 = #{i4,jdbcType=REAL}, i5 = #{i5,jdbcType=REAL}, i6 = #{i6,jdbcType=REAL}, i7 = #{i7,jdbcType=REAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT t_branchbox.branchBoxId, t_branchbox.epu_name, t_power_quality.C_ChannelId, t_power_quality.ua AS u, t_power_quality.i1 AS i, t_power_quality.p, t_power_quality.q FROM t_branchbox LEFT JOIN t_power_quality ON t_power_quality.C_AddressId = t_branchbox.C_AddressId AND t_power_quality.C_DistrictBCDId = t_branchbox.C_DistrictBCDId AND t_power_quality.C_ChannelId = t_branchbox.C_ChannelId WHERE t_branchbox.DEL_FLAG = '0' AND t_power_quality.TSegmentId = #{tSegmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND t_power_quality.RecordDateBCD = #{recordDateBCD,jdbcType=INTEGER} ${paramSQL}

SELECT t_branchbox.branchBoxId, t_branchbox.epu_name, t_power_quality.C_ChannelId, t_power_quality.ub AS u, t_power_quality.i1 AS i, t_power_quality.p, t_power_quality.q FROM t_branchbox LEFT JOIN t_power_quality ON t_power_quality.C_AddressId = t_branchbox.C_AddressId AND t_power_quality.C_DistrictBCDId = t_branchbox.C_DistrictBCDId AND t_power_quality.C_ChannelId = t_branchbox.C_ChannelId_b WHERE t_branchbox.DEL_FLAG = '0' AND t_power_quality.TSegmentId = #{tSegmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND t_power_quality.RecordDateBCD = #{recordDateBCD,jdbcType=INTEGER} ${paramSQL}

SELECT t_branchbox.branchBoxId, t_branchbox.epu_name, t_power_quality.C_ChannelId, t_power_quality.uc AS u, t_power_quality.i1 AS i, t_power_quality.p, t_power_quality.q FROM t_branchbox LEFT JOIN t_power_quality ON t_power_quality.C_AddressId = t_branchbox.C_AddressId AND t_power_quality.C_DistrictBCDId = t_branchbox.C_DistrictBCDId AND t_power_quality.C_ChannelId = t_branchbox.C_ChannelId_c WHERE t_branchbox.DEL_FLAG = '0' AND t_power_quality.TSegmentId = #{tSegmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND t_power_quality.RecordDateBCD = #{recordDateBCD,jdbcType=INTEGER} ${paramSQL}
